attributes.action: ensure that those dishonoured by their actions may not be honoured in any way.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is customary for political figures to receive "rubber stamp" knighthoods, peerages etc. when retiring from office. Where it can be shown that the individual in question has been devious and insincere, such false honour should be denied, as it insults Queen and country.
